DeconstructList.summary: this class is a extension method that allow create specific method for example decostruct of a list, that allow you use pattern matching (head, tail)

Deconstruct.summary: allow create a tuple respost from a list , example (head,tail).
Deconstruct.param: This is the parameter that we want applies deconstruct for use head and tail
This is head of the list that applies deconstruct
This is a tail of the list that applies deconstruct

This is head of the IEnumerable that applies deconstruct
